original_text: But you refuse to change the way that you live. You are not sorry about the wrong things that you have done. As a result, you cause God to become even angrier with you. So he will punish you even more on the day when he will judge everyone. On that day, he will show how angry he is against people who do bad things. Everyone will know that he judges people in a right way.
korean_text: 다만 네 고집과 회개하지 아니한 마음을 따라 진노의 날 곧 하나님의 의로우신 심판이 나타나는 그 날에 임할 진노를 네게 쌓는도다

sentences.original_text: But you refuse to change the way that you live.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 당신은 살아가는 방식을 바꾸기를 거부합니다.

sentences.original_text: You are not sorry about the wrong things that you have done.
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 자신이 저지른 잘못된 일들에 대해 미안해하지 않습니다.

sentences.original_text: As a result, you cause God to become even angrier with you.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 결과, 당신은 하나님이 당신에게 더욱 화나게 만듭니다.

sentences.original_text: So he will punish you even more
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그는 당신을 더욱 많이 벌할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: on the day when he will judge everyone.
On that day, he will show how angry he is
sentences.korean_translation: 그날, 그는 자신의 분노가 얼마나 큰지 보여줄 것입니다

sentences.original_text: against people who do bad things.
Everyone will know that he judges people in a right way.
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 사람이 그가 올바른 방식으로 사람들을 심판한다는 것을 알게 될 것입니다.
